artist: Artist: Dorothy Woollard; Designer: George Jones; Author: Geoffrey Chaucer; Translator: Frank Ernest Hill; Publisher: The Limited Editions Club; Printer: George W. Jones
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
description: binding: half cream linen, lettering stamped in black, brown paper sides w/ Chaucer's arms in color; endpapers: white laid with printed grid pattern in yellow-orange; slip case: brown paper over cardboard, title, etc. in black, Chaucer's arms printed in black and red; type: Linotype Granjon; 700 pp. 2 vols.
inscription:
Signature; Edition 
on back color-printed initials
title: The Canterbury Tales
